TopicTitle: The Name Change Thread (WARNING! ONE TIME ONLY!)

Articles.Content: Can my name be changed to SnakePlanet123 please?

I was thinking of changing my name, but I don't really know what to change it to. Having the name of a real-life/in development spacecraft seems a bit wrong. 

Feel free to move if this is considered off-topic.

[@Skylon](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/175317-skylon/) If indeed you do change your name, you might want to change your member title to something like "AKA Skylon" so people still recognize you.

> 
> 
> Just now, Ultimate Steve said:
> 
> 
> [@Skylon](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/175317-skylon/) If indeed you do change your name, you might want to change your member title to something like "AKA Skylon" so people still recognize you.
> 

Yeah, people recognising me was one of the reasons i want to change it sooner rather than later, while I'm not very well known

> > > 2 hours ago, Skylon said: > > > I was thinking of changing my name, but I don't really know what to change it to. Having the name of a real-life/in development spacecraft seems a bit wrong. > I was thinking of changing mine to *"Stormageddon: Dark Lord of All"*... but only Whovians would get the joke. **I'M KIDDING!!!** ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D") But seriously, I can understand you wanting to change your name... it might feel a little weird.

> 
> 
> 8 hours ago, saturnsrings said:
> 
> 
> Can my name be changed to SnakePlanet123 please?
> 

Done.

> 
> 
> 45 minutes ago, Just Jim said:
> 
> 
> *"Stormageddon: Dark Lord of All"*...
> 

*"Sorry, what?"*

*"That's what he calls himself.*"

*"And how do you know that?"*

*"I speak baby."*

> 
> 
> On 2017-09-03 at 11:16 PM, Vanamonde said:
> 
> 
> I'm sorry, but that name is taken. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif ":(")
> 

Any chance for a cleanup? That account has never been used

> 
> 
> 5 minutes ago, Katten said:
> 
> 
> Any chance for a cleanup? That account has never been used
> 

No, I'm sorry, but we don't act on one person's account to favor another person.

Thanks!
